channel.title: Hyperglycemia on Sequr (dev)
channel.description: Recent content in Hyperglycemia on Sequr (dev)

item.title: 2 months in
item.description: It’s been about 2 months since my diagnosis. How am I doing?

item.title: I've been chipped and am getting training
item.description: I’ve been chipped. I now wear a nice glucose monitoring chip on my arm. I’m also getting trained in how to manage my blood sugar levels.
